title: Extract parseAffirmationResponse to shared utility
description:
Either:
1. Import parseAffirmationResponse directly from app/fo-01/actions.ts, or
2. Extract to lib/affirmation-utils.ts for reuse

The parser handles JSON array or numbered list responses from the LLM.
closed_reason: Decided NOT to extract to shared utility - keeping parseAffirmationsResponse in app/fo-02/actions.ts inline (same as FO-01 pattern). Spec suggested either approach; inline is simpler and follows existing codebase conventions.
